items.text: short of a length on leg stump, defended to midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, no run

items.text: length on middle, punched on the rise to mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, tapped to mid-off on the up
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length on off, pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length on off stump, punched back down the pitch
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, no run

items.text: nearly sends it into the camera tower! What a hit that is! Length ball on off. Not quite to the pitch of this length ball after he steps out but he swings cleanly and straight over the bowler, very very high
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, SIX runs

items.text: length on off, tapped to cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, no run

items.text: a chip this time, over square with a sweep. Length on off and once again not clean connection. Plonks in the outfield
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, 2 runs

items.text: length on middle, tapped back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, no run

items.text: length on middle, flicked to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, no run

items.text: sweet connection this time. Full and pushed flat outside off. Plants the front leg forward and hits through the line, inside-out and over the long-off boundary
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, SIX runs

items.text: length and in at the corridor. Beaten on the outside edge as he looks to punch through cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length at off, tapped to mid-off on the up
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, no run

items.text: slower ball at a length on off stump, tapped into the covers on the up
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length and down leg side, can't get bat on it
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, 1 wide

items.text: short of a length just outside off, stabbed to point's right with an open face
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: bouncer dug in too short, left alone
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, no run

items.text: length on middle stump, tapped to midwicket on the up
items.postText: Roshan: "Albeit the under par total, B'desh should've taken this opportunity to bring in Rubel for Miraz, possibly. They usually have at least one frontline spinner, but considering that Rubel is for sure going to be one of their frontline seamers in the World Cup, it would be best to test him out in these conditions in a series decider."
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, no run

items.text: short of a length at leg stump, dabbed through square leg off the inside half
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: length on leg stump, flicked to deep square
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: length and in at middle stump. Defended to midwicket off the inside half
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Nicholls, no run

items.text: taken at deep square leg! Short ball down leg side, there to be lifted over the boundary, but Nicholls' pull is not as powerful as he'd like. Ends up picking the fielder with a loopy shot
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Nicholls, OUT

dismissal.text: HM Nicholls c Liton Das b Mustafizur Rahman 14 (31m 23b 2x4 0x6) SR: 60.86

items.text: length on leg stump, flicked through square leg
items.postText: James: "This is looking like a better balanced opening combination for NZ. Guptill the aggressor, Nicholls one of the best test batsmen going round. "
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: length on off, shuffles and defends into the leg side
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williamson, no run

items.text: glove over the keeper. Short ball at middle stump and he's through the hook too early
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, FOUR runs
